alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:01PM EST until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Pembroke, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River Near Lumberton. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:55 PM EST Friday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 13.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Saturday morning.
